item.title: Gym bunnies are wasting their time, study suggests
item.description:
Gym bunnies are wasting their time, study suggests

But after a certain threshold - described by scientists as a "sweet spot" - the extra time working up a sweat made no difference to the amount of calories burned. Experts said it might explain by those who embark on gym routines in a bid to weight loss often see weight loss hit a plateau after a few months.

item.title: Gain Muscle, Lose Fat
item.description:
Gain Muscle, Lose Fat

There's plenty of folk wisdom about how to do this, including making sure you get lots of protein. Phillips and his team put this idea to the test, and a very rigorous test it was.

item.title: Ask the Diet Doctor: Vitamin D and Weight Loss
item.description:
Ask the Diet Doctor: Vitamin D and Weight Loss

Q: Does vitamin D help you lose weight? A: Currently the darling vitamin in the eyes of the media and many scientists, vitamin D has been linked to breast cancer outcomes, and low levels of the nutrient have been associated with a 200-percent increased risk of death in potential cardiac patients.

item.title: 10 Tips to Transform Your Physique
item.description:
10 Tips to Transform Your Physique

Written by in Health & Fitness on the 18th January 2016 / 10 Tips to Transform Your Physique Making efforts aimlessly in a random manner is going to take you nowhere. First, figure out what is the ultimate outcome you desire, next, identify the type of exercises and diet best suited for accomplishment of that outcome.

item.title: Age Management Medicine Group : Home
item.description:
Age Management Medicine Group : Home

AMMG provides Age Management Medicine education to physicians and healthcare professionals with evidence-based continuing medical education conferences and certification.

item.title: 20-Minute Muscle Builder
item.description:
20-Minute Muscle Builder

You can build muscle and strength in as little as 20 minutes a day if you know what you're doing. Twenty minutes of well planned, focused training will lead to significant improvements in your physique and work capacity. This program only requires a barbell and, ideally, a bench.
